A must-read roundup of our most popular stories of the week.

In case you missed them, we've rounded up our most popular stories of the week to help you stay in the loop. No need to thank us — just toast a flat white in our honor when you're discussing who did what over your lemon ricotta pancakes.

THE 2024 BLACK FRIDAY AND CYBER MONDAY FASHION AND BEAUTY SALES WE'RE ACTUALLY SHOPPING
"Shop small" with these can't-miss holiday deals from our favorite indie fashion and beauty brands.

HOW I SHOP: LEAH KATEB
The "Love Island" star talks her favorite looks from the season, her vintage designer sources and her fashion industry aspirations.

PLAID MAXI SKIRTS, CHUCK TAYLORS AND LOTS OF LAYERING TOOK OVER STREET STYLE AT CAMP FLOG GNAW 2024
Tyler, The Creator's Los Angeles festival brought just as much inspiring fashion as it did great music.

HOW JAN MARINI SPEARHEADED THE USE OF GLYCOLIC ACID IN SKIN CARE
The beauty founder discussed securing placements in dermatologist offices, her formulation process, "skin longevity" tips and more, live on The Fashionista Network.

39 GIFTS FOR THE FASHIONABLE PET PARENT IN YOUR LIFE
For the person who puts their dog or cat above everything (and everyone) else.

12 UNDER-$40 BEAUTY GIFTS GEN ALPHA WILL LOVE
Featuring star-shaped pimple patches, lip gloss keychains and hydration-first skin care.

WHAT FASHION PEOPLE ARE GIFTING FOR THE HOLIDAYS
Designers, editors, buyers and creators — all with excellent taste — divulge the gifts they're actually giving their loved ones this season.

A BEAUTY MARKETER'S PLAYBOOK FOR HOW TO CREATE AND NAVIGATE BRAND VIRALITY
Liza Suloti of Shadow shares how she helps beauty clients like E.l.f. and Tatcha go viral — and makes the most of those moments when they happen.

13 BEAUTY GIFTS GEN ZS ACTUALLY WANT THIS YEAR
All for under $50.
